// http://www.codechef.com/problems/CDS003
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

#define size 1000

void readChars(int n, char *str, int i, char *temp)
{
    int j = 0;
	for(j = 0; j<n; j++) {
		temp[j] = str[i+j];
	}
	temp[j] = '\0';
}

int atoi(char *str)
{
	int i = 0;
	int n = 0;
	while(str[i] != '\0') {
		n = 10*n + str[i] - '0';
		i++;
	}
	return n;
}

int main(void)
{
	int runs;
	scanf("%d", &runs);
	while(runs--) {
		char str[size];
		int i = 0;

		scanf("%s", &str);

		char temp[4];
		int n = 0; i = 0;
		while(str[i] != '\0') {
			// cout<< endl<<  i ;
			if(str[i] == '1') {
				readChars(3, str, i, temp);
				n = atoi(temp); //cout << temp << "  ->  " << n << endl;
				printf("%c", n);
				i += 3;
			}
			else {
				readChars(2, str, i, temp);
				n = atoi(temp);
				printf("%c", n);
				i += 2;
			}
		}
		printf("\n");
	}


	return 0;
}
